query.original: Posters portraying "Ghazwa-E-Hind" were put on a mosque in Indore, MP. Police are investigating the matter.Ghazwa-e-hind dream is about converting Hindus & establishing Islamic rule in entire Indian subcontinent. Slowly slowly they've openly started expressing their dream but still some Hindus won't accept it because they're blinded with secularism.
